title: Critical Thinking Enhancement Program Through Digital Role-Playing Games

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and experience with digital devices
context.additional_context: Program for elementary and pre-service teachers targeting language-related professional competencies. Applying hybrid pedagogical methods combining game-based learning and real-time interaction

learning_goals: Learners improve their logical reasoning skills by over 30% through scenario resolution in digital role-playing games
Learners acquire critical evaluation skills to analyze diverse perspectives in in-game decision-making processes
Learners increase their learning motivation scores by 25% compared to pre-assessment through game-based learning

resources: Custom Educational Digital Game Developed with RPG Maker

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
